title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ, specifically in the ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example, the XML file 'test.xml' is not opened with a different editor when selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' in the Navigator. Instead, the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content, remains active.
EB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for 'test.xml' in the Navigator, a new editor should open for the file, taking into consideration that it has a different editor type.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project. 
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'. 
3. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'. 
4. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
